yagames_sdk.name: YandexGamesSDK
yagames_sdk.description: Plugin for developing games for Yandex Games platform

default-localization-language.name: Fallback localization language
default-localization-language.desc: Language, that will be used if selected language is not supported. (ISO-639-1 format)

automatic-initialization.name: Automatic initialization
automatic-initialization.desc: If enabled, plugin will automatically initialize Yandex.Games SDK.

on-fullscreen-ad-close.description: Runs when fullscreen ad was closed.

fullscreen-ad-was-shown.description: Indicates that fullscreen ad was shown. (Works only with "Fullscreen AD closed" condition)

on-fullscreen-ad-open.description: Runs when fullscreen ad was opened.

on-fullscreen-ad-error.description: Exectues when fullscreen ad error occured.

on-fullscreen-ad-offline.description: Exectues when there is not internet connection to show fullscreen ad.

on-rewarded-ad-open.description: Runs when specific rewarded ad was opened.

id.name: Tag
id.desc: A tag used to distinguish advertising events from each other. (It's not affiliated with Yandex Advertising Network)

on-rewarded-ad-rewarded.description: Runs when specific rewarded ad was fully watched.

id.name: Tag
id.desc: A tag used to distinguish advertising events from each other. (It's not affiliated with Yandex Advertising Network)

on-rewarded-ad-close.description: Runs when specific rewarded ad was closed.

id.name: Tag
id.desc: A tag used to distinguish advertising events from each other. (It's not affiliated with Yandex Advertising Network)

on-rewarded-ad-error.description: Exectues when specific rewarded ad error occured.

id.name: Tag
id.desc: A tag used to distinguish advertising events from each other. (It's not affiliated with Yandex Advertising Network)

on-any-rewarded-ad-open.description: Runs when any rewarded ad was opened.

on-any-rewarded-ad-close.description: Runs when any rewarded ad was closed.

on-any-rewarded-ad-error.description: Exectues when any rewarded ad error occured.

is-mobile.description: Checks if game is running on mobile.

is-desktop.description: Checks if game is running on desktop.

is-tablet.description: Checks if game is running on tablet.

is-tv.description: Checks if game is running on TV.

for-each-leaderboard-entry.display-text: [DEPRECATED] For each player in [b]{0}[/b] leaderboard. Top: [b]{1}[/b], User: [b]{2}[/b], Around: [b]{3}[/b].
for-each-leaderboard-entry.description: [DEPRECATED] Requests and iterates through Yandex.Games leaderboard entries.

quantityTop.name: Quantity Top
quantityTop.desc: Number of entries from the top of the leaderboard.

includeUser.name: Include User
includeUser.desc: Defines whether to include the logged-in user in the response.

quantityAround.name: Quantity Around
quantityAround.desc: Number of entries to return below and above the user in the leaderboard.

current-leadeboard-description-invert-or.description: Inverts order of leaderboard. (Works only with "For each player in leaderboard" condition)

on-purchase-success.description: Runs when any purchase was successful.

on-purchase-error.description: Runs when error accured while purchasing product.

on-specific-purchase-success.description: Runs when specific product purchase was successful.

productID.name: ID
productID.desc: Unique identifier of product in catalog.

on-specific-purchase-error.description: Runs when error accured while purchasing specific product.

productID.name: ID
productID.desc: Unique identifier of product in catalog.

with-player-info.display-text: [DEPRECATED] Using player info. Request Personal Info: [b]{0}[/b].
with-player-info.description: [DEPRECATED] Requests player info for further use

requestAuthorization.name: Request personal info
requestAuthorization.desc: If enabled, the player will see a window asking for permission to share their data with the game. Otherwise, you will only have access to the player's unique identifier.

current-player-is-authorized.description: Checks if player is authorized in Yandex.Games. (Works only with "Using player info" condition)

current-player-info-access-granted.description: Checks if player gave your game permission to access personal information about them. Works only with "Using player info" condition.

current-player-paying-status-check.description: Condition to check paying status of player. (Works only with "Using player info" condition)

value.name: Check value
value.desc: Value to check. (Paying / Partially paying / Not paying / Unknown)

on-history-back-event.description: Triggers when user clicks on the Back button. (Works only on TV)

on-game-api-pause.description: Triggers when platform signals that the game is should be paused.

on-game-api-resume.description: Triggers when platform signals that the game is should be resumed.

shortcut-can-show-prompt.description: Checks if you able to show prompt to add game to home screen.

shortcut-added.description: Indicates that shortcut was added to home screen.

can-review.description: Checks if the user can leave a review.

on-review-cancel.description: Runs when user declines to leave a review

throttle-new.list-name: Not more than once in X seconds
throttle-new.display-text: Not more than once in [b]{1}[/b] seconds
throttle-new.description: Skips subsequent executions for some time after the last execution.

seconds.name: Seconds
seconds.desc: Time for which subsequent executions will be ignored.

debounce-end.description: Delays execution of code for some time after the last call

throttle.list-name: [DEPRECATED] Not more than once in X seconds
throttle.display-text: [DEPRECATED] Not more than once in [b]{0}[/b] seconds
throttle.description: [DEPRECATED] Skips subsequent executions for some time after the last condition check.

seconds.name: Seconds
seconds.desc: Time for which subsequent executions will be ignored.

debounce.description: [DEPRECATED] Delays the execution of the code for some time after the last condition check.

seconds.name: Seconds
seconds.desc: Time after which the code will work after the last condition check

on-remote-config-ready.description: [DEPRECATED] Runs when remote config is ready to use.

tv-button-pressed.description: Runs when user holds specified button on TV remote.

on-tv-button-press.description: Runs when user clicks specified button on TV remote.

on-tv-button-release.description: Runs when user releases specified button on TV remote.

get-all-games.description: [DEPRECATED] Retrieves information about all your games that are available on the current platform and domain.

get-game-by-id.description: [DEPRECATED] Retrieves data about a specific game and its availability on the current platform and domain.

id.name: App ID
id.desc: The game's identifier, as set in the developer console.

is-current-game-available.description: Checks if currently selected game is currently avaible on the current platform and domain. (Works only with "For each game")

on-leaderboard-fetch-success.display-text: Leaderboard [b]{0}[/b] is successfully fetched with top: [b]{1}[/b], user: [b]{2}[/b], around: [b]{3}[/b]
on-leaderboard-fetch-success.description: Runs when leaderboard was successfully fetched.

quantityTop.name: Quantity Top
quantityTop.desc: Number of entries from the top of the leaderboard.

includeUser.name: Include User
includeUser.desc: Defines whether to include the logged-in user in the response.

quantityAround.name: Quantity Around
quantityAround.desc: Number of entries to return below and above the user in the leaderboard.

on-leaderboard-fetch-error.display-text: Failure to fetch leaderboard [b]{0}[/b] with top: [b]{1}[/b], user: [b]{2}[/b], around: [b]{3}[/b]
on-leaderboard-fetch-error.description: Runs when error accured while leaderboard fetching.

quantityTop.name: Quantity Top
quantityTop.desc: Number of entries from the top of the leaderboard.

includeUser.name: Include User
includeUser.desc: Defines whether to include the logged-in user in the response.

quantityAround.name: Quantity Around
quantityAround.desc: Number of entries to return below and above the user in the leaderboard.

for-each-in-leaderboard.display-text: For each player in current leaderboard

on-purchases-fetch-success.description: Runs when purchases was successfully fetched.

on-purchases-fetch-error.description: Runs when error accured while purchases fetching.

on-catalog-fetch-success.description: Runs when catalog was successfully fetched.

on-catalog-fetch-error.description: Runs when error accured while catalog fetching.

on-player-info-fetch-success.description: Runs when player info was successfully fetched.

on-player-info-fetch-error.description: Runs when error accured while player info fetching.

on-remote-config-fetch-success.description: Runs when remote config was successfully fetched.

on-remote-config-fetch-error.description: Runs when error accured while remote config fetching.

on-all-games-fetch-success.description: Runs when developers's games were successfully fetched.

on-all-games-fetch-error.description: Runs when error accured while developer's games fetching.

on-game-by-id-fetch-success.display-text: Game with ID: [b]{0}[/b] is successfully fetched
on-game-by-id-fetch-success.description: Runs when game was successfully fetched.

on-game-by-id-fetch-error.display-text: Failure to fetch game with ID: [b]{0}[/b]
on-game-by-id-fetch-error.description: Runs when error accured while game fetching.

for-each-game.list-name: For each game in developer's games
for-each-game.display-text: For each game in developer's games

initialize-ysdk.description: Manually initializes Yandex.Games SDK. (use only if automatic initialization is disabled)

loading-api-ready.description: Sends information to Yandex.Games that the game download is complete.

gameplay-api-start.description: Sends information to Yandex.Games that the gameplay section has started.

gameplay-api-stop.description: Sends information to Yandex.Games that the gameplay section has ended.

id.name: Tag
id.desc: A tag used to distinguish advertising events from each other. (It's not affiliated with Yandex Advertising Network)

set-leaderboard-score.display-text: Set leaderboard [b]{0}[/b] score to [b]{1}[/b] with data [b]{2}[/b]
set-leaderboard-score.description: Sets player score in Yandex.Games leaderboard.

extraData.name: Extra Data
extraData.desc: Optional metadata sent with the game score.

productID.name: Product ID
productID.desc: Unique identifier of product to purchase. (See Yandex.Games console)

developerPayload.name: Payload
developerPayload.desc: Optional payload to send with purchase.

purchaseToken.name: Purchase Token
purchaseToken.desc: Unique value set for each successful purchase of a product. Used in purchase consumption.

player-get-data.display-text: Get player data with keys: {1} and store in {0}

jsonObject.name: JSON Object
jsonObject.desc: JSON object to store player data from Yandex.Games.

keys.name: Keys
keys.desc: Keys to request from Yandex.Games separated by comma. (Example: "key1,key2,key3")

player-get-stats.display-text: Get player stats and store in {0}

jsonObject.name: JSON Object
jsonObject.desc: JSON object to store player stats from Yandex.Games.

jsonObject.name: JSON Object
jsonObject.desc: JSON object to set player data in Yandex.Games.

flush.name: Flush
flush.desc: Determines the order data is sent in. If enabled, the data is immediately sent to the server. If it's disabled (default), the request to send data is queued.

jsonObject.name: JSON Object
jsonObject.desc: JSON object to set player stats in Yandex.Games.

jsonObject.name: JSON Object
jsonObject.desc: JSON object to increment player stats in Yandex.Games.

debounce.description: Delays the generation of an event for some time after the last call.

shortcut-show-prompt.description: Shows dialog box to create desktop shortcut for game.

emulate-mobile.description: Useful for testing game in mobile mode. (will be ignored in production)

emulate-tablet.description: Useful for testing game in tablet mode. (will be ignored in production)

emulate-desktop.description: Useful for testing game in desktop mode. (will be ignored in production)

emulate-tv.description: Useful for testing game in TV mode. (will be ignored in production)

request-review.description: Requests review from user, if permission was granted.

remote-config-set-default.display-text: Remote config. Set key [b]{0}[/b] default value to [b]{1}[/b]
remote-config-set-default.description: Sets default remote config key, that will be used if remote config is fetch failed.

remote-config-set-client-feature.display-text: Remote config. Set client feature [b]{0}[/b] to [b]{1}[/b]
remote-config-set-client-feature.description: Sets client feature key for further use in remote config fetch.

value.name: Value
value.desc: Value of client feature. Only string values are allowed.

remote-config-fetch.description: Fetches remote config for further use.

leaderboard-fetch.display-text: Fetch leaderboard [b]{0}[/b] with top: [b]{1}[/b], user: [b]{2}[/b], around: [b]{3}[/b]

quantityTop.name: Quantity Top
quantityTop.desc: Number of entries from the top of the leaderboard.

includeUser.name: Include User
includeUser.desc: Defines whether to include the logged-in user in the response.

quantityAround.name: Quantity Around
quantityAround.desc: Number of entries to return below and above the user in the leaderboard.

player-info-fetch.description: Fetch personal info for further use.

all-games-fetch.description: Fetch all developer's games for further use.

game-by-id-fetch.description: Fetch game by ID for further use.

fullscreen-ad-error.description: Contains error message if error occured while showing fullscreen ad. (Works only with "Fullscreen AD error" condition)

rewarded-ad-error.description: Contains error message if error occured while showing rewarded ad. (Works only with "Rewarded AD error" condition)

current-localization-language.description: Returns localization language current used to translate the game.

old-current-localization-language.description: [DEPRECATED] Returns localization language current used to translate the game.

localization-value.description: Returns value of specified key in current localization language.

get-language.description: Yandex Games interface language in ISO 639-1 format. For example, "tr" means that the game is currently running under the Yandex Games Turkish interface. We recommend using this parameter to determine the user's language in the game.

get-tld.description: Top-level domain. For example, "com" means that the game is currently running under the Yandex Games international domain. When hosting a game in your domain, please keep in mind that it must open correctly under any Yandex domain.

get-payload.description: The value of the payload parameter from the game's address. Optional. For example, in https://yandex.ru/games/app/123?payload=test you can return test as follows: ysdk.environment.payload.

get-app-id.description: Identifier of the your application in Yandex.Games.

old-get-language.description: [DEPRECATED] Yandex Games interface language in ISO 639-1 format. For example, "tr" means that the game is currently running under the Yandex Games Turkish interface. We recommend using this parameter to determine the user's language in the game.

old-get-tld.description: [DEPRECATED] Top-level domain. For example, "com" means that the game is currently running under the Yandex Games international domain. When hosting a game in your domain, please keep in mind that it must open correctly under any Yandex domain.

old-get-payload.description: [DEPRECATED] The value of the payload parameter from the game's address. Optional. For example, in https://yandex.ru/games/app/123?payload=test you can return test as follows: ysdk.environment.payload.

old-get-app-id.description: [DEPRECATED] Identifier of the your application in Yandex.Games.

current-leadeboard-entry-rank.description: The position obtained by comparing the score of all players.

current-leadeboard-entry-score.description: The score obtained by the player in the game.

current-leadeboard-entry-extra-data.description: Optional metadata sent with the game score.

current-leadeboard-entry-range-index.description: When requesting positions from the leaderboard, several intervals of values can be formed.

current-leadeboard-description-name.description: Technical name of the leaderboard. (not intended for users to see)

current-leadeboard-description-type.description: Leaderboard result type. Available parameters: numeric (number), time (seconds).

current-leadeboard-description-title.description: Localized display title of leaderboard. (intended for users to see)

current-leadeboard-description-decimal-o.description: Score offset. For example, when decimal_offset: 2 1234 will be displayed as 12.34.

purchase-token.description: String, unique value set for each successful purchase of a product. Used in purchase consumption.

current-purchase-token.translated-name: Current purchase token in purchases list
current-purchase-token.description: String, unique value set for each successful purchase of a product. Used in purchase consumption.

current-purchase-developer-payload.translated-name: Current purchase developer payload in purchases list

purchase-signature.description: String, signature of purchase. (Works only with "Any purchase success" and "Specific product purchase success")

purchase-error.description: String, error message if error occured while purchasing product. (Works only with "Any purchase error" and "Specific product purchase failure")

purchases-signature.description: String, signature of purchases list. (Works only with "For each purchase")

current-purchases-product-id.translated-name: Current product ID in purchases list

product-price.description: String, the product price in the <price> <currency code> format. For example, "25 YAN".

product-price-value.description: String, the product price in the <price> format. For example, "25".

product-price-currency-image.description: String, the icon address. You must specify "medium", "small", or "svg" as the size parameter.

size.name: Size
size.desc: Size of icon. Should be "medium", "small", or "svg".

current-player-unique-id.translated-name: Current player unique ID in leaderboard

player-name.description: Name, that player set in Yandex.

current-player-name.description: Name, that player set in Yandex.

player-avatar.description: String, URL of player avatar of specified size.

current-player-avatar.description: String, URL of player avatar of specified size.

player-avatar-small.description: String, URL of small player avatar.

current-player-avatar-small.translated-name: Current player in leaderboard small avatar
current-player-avatar-small.description: String, URL of small player avatar.

player-avatar-medium.description: String, URL of medium player avatar.

current-player-avatar-medium.translated-name: Current player in leaderboard medium avatar
current-player-avatar-medium.description: String, URL of medium player avatar.

player-avatar-large.description: String, URL of large player avatar.

current-player-avatar-large.translated-name: Current player in leaderboard large avatar
current-player-avatar-large.description: String, URL of large player avatar.

current-player-signature.description: String contains user data from the Yandex profile and the signature. It comprises two Base64-encoded strings

current-player-paying-status.description: String, paying status of player. (paying / partially_paying / not_paying / unknown)

remote-config-get-flag.description: Returns the value of the flag set in the Games Console.

name.name: Name
name.desc: Name of the flag in Games Console.

server-time.description: Returns the current time on the server in milliseconds. (Works only with "For each game" and "Select Game By ID")

current-game-app-id.description: Returns the unique identifier (App ID) of the current game. (Works only with "For each game" and "Select Game by ID")

current-game-title.description: Returns the title of the current game. (Works only with "For each game" and "Select Game by ID")

current-game-url.description: Returns the URL of the current game. (Works only with "For each game" and "Select Game by ID")

current-game-coverURL.description: Returns the URL of the cover image for the current game. (Works only with "For each game" and "Select Game by ID")

current-game-iconURL.description: Returns the URL of the icon for the current game. (Works only with "For each game" and "Select Game by ID")

developerURL.description: Returns the URL of the developer's page.
